title: 1. Spatial Units
text: creation streetblocks requires two input datasets: - polygon representing extents study area, - linestrings representing highways/ streets study area. Typically, study area extents pre-defined known us (administrative municipal boundary within particular city region). vignette, ’ll define location center Bangalore draw 500m buffer around . can use buffer bounding box download highways/ streets OpenStreetMap. Note: datasets included multi can accessed using data() function. code chunk uses datasets draw street blocks. Aside setting merge_threshold = NULL, use function defaults.  Notice function warns us presence small geometries (< m^2). small geometries often created input data contains multiple linestrings close proximity. Awkward street intersections small traffic islands also result small geometries. address , can either define non-null merge_threshold value (m^2) creating street blocks use st_merge_spatialunits function subsequently. can also use st_survey_spatialunits() function get overview current sizes.  st_merge_spatialunits() function uses iterative merging process. Please refer Iterative Merging Vignette details. , use 4050 m^2 merge threshold max_shared_boundary merge type.  merging process results 74 streetblocks initial value 314.

title: 1. Spatial Units
text: process creating morphological tessellation units (MTs) similar process drawing streetblocks. major difference require data building polygons rather highway/ street linestrings. data can also obtained OpenStreetMap. , example data included package. code chunk uses datasets draw MTs. use default values segment_length, shrink_extent, merge_type, contiguity. however define merge threshold 100 m^2. Fair warning, function (currently) takes longer execute. text: x sf object POLYGON geometries representing buildings. boundary sf object POLYGON geometries representing extents study area. type string; Type tessellated spatial unit create. See Fleischmann et al., 2020 details. shrink_extent numeric; Extent inward buffer building polygons. Default = 0.4. See Fleischmann et al., 2020 details. merge_threshold numeric; value represents smallest acceptable size spatial unit. Contiguous units iteratively merged value reached. skip process, set merge_threshold = NULL. See st_merge_spatialunits() details. merge_type string; Passed st_merge_spatialunits(). Criteria polygons merged. Must one "min_centroid_distance", "min_shared_boundary", "max_shared_boundary". Default = "min_centroid_distance". See st_merge_spatialunits() details. contiguity string; one "queen" "rook". Default = "rook". verbose logical; FALSE status messages output.
